ygData.subject: Re: Sean - Warrior only shield?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nagafen s Lair is soulsek B... very hard dungeon... I would love to get one of those shields tho =)
ygData.messageBody:
Nagafen's Lair is soulsek B... very hard dungeon... I would love to get
one of those shields tho =)

On Tue, 8 Jun 1999, Mifsud, Michael wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> hmm my mistake (whats new?) The information came from a warrior who had the
> shield, he said nagafens lair ... maybe he purposely misled me?
>
> > ----------
> > From: Sean Ross[SMTP:sross@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 8:04 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Michael - Warrior only shield?
> >
> > From: Sean Ross <sross@...>
> >
> > u have to kill the unicorn in lesser faydark to get the shield. the
> > unicorn
> > is lvl 45. the shield itselfs doubles as a weapon i think 9dm pierceing.
> >
> > Nick Morgowicz wrote:
> >
> > > From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
> > >
> > > I know you said that most of us knew where this shield was, but
> > > unfortunetely i don't. I'm level 20, close to 21 now, and have access to
> > > making my group very balanced from levels 20-25. We were able to get an
> > > ogre war maul and the barbed whip from Najena. Where can this shield be
> > > found?
> > >
>
